sense.def: Pathological Condition of tong feng 痛風 , pain wind, characterized by aching bone joints with the pain increasing during the night and reaching into the bone marrow. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 22: 治白虎風，痛徹骨髓，晝靜夜發，宜服酸棗仁散方 , “To treat white ti ger wind with pain penetrating into the bones and their marrow, that is calm during daytime and breaks out during the night, the recipe to ingest the ‘powder with suan zao kernels’ is advisable”.
